sentence2: Financial tracking primarily involves examining credit card receipts and bank statements.

sentence2: Some Treasury officials did not believe the CIA valued financial tracking.

sentence2: The CIA relied on financial tracking as it's primary counter terrorism tool.

sentence2: The US government spends $7 billion on military intelligence each year.

sentence2: The US government spends money on their military intelligence.

sentence2: The US government won't tell anyone how much they spend on anything.

sentence2: Bin Ladin's security threat should have been evident to the government after the embassy bombings.
sentence2_translated: Mũthuthuria wa ũgitĩri wa Bin Laden nĩ wagĩrĩirũo gũkorũo ũrĩ mũiganu harĩ thirikari thutha wa mbomu cia mbũtũ ĩyo kũhithũkwo.

sentence2: The embassy bombings killed fifteen people.

sentence2: There was never any indication that Bin Ladin represented a threat to the government.
sentence2_translated: Gũtirĩ hĩndĩ kwagĩa na ũira wa atĩ Bin Laden nĩ arĩ mũgwati harĩ thirikari.

sentence2: The NYPD failed to respond to the North Tower until after 10:00 AM.
sentence2_translated: Kĩama kĩa NYPD gĩtiacokire kũigua ũhoro wĩgiĩ nyũmba ya ũthamaki nginya thutha wa thaa ikũmi cia rũcinĩ.

sentence2: The team consisted of more than a dozen people.

sentence2: The tower was still standing at 9:15 AM.
sentence2_translated: Ngoro ĩyo yarĩ o ĩrũgamĩte thaa kenda na ikũmi na ithano cia rũcinĩ.

sentence2: Nobody knows what the instructor's reaction was.

sentence2: The FBI was interested in the instructor's reaction to a video of two kittens playing with a ball.

sentence2: The instructor of the Academy was James Milton.

sentence2: Every gift we get is not as important as yours.

sentence2: We do not care about your gift at all.
sentence2_translated: Tũtiĩhĩtie o na hanini nĩ ũndũ wa kĩheo gĩaku.

sentence2: We have been doing this for more than 80 years.
sentence2_translated: Twarĩ na mĩaka makĩria ma 80 tũraruta wĩra ũcio.

sentence2: Our law school depends on private funding alone.

sentence2: Our law school is supported in part by the Melinda and Bill Gates Foundation.

sentence2: Our law school needs money to continue to grow.
sentence2_translated: Thukuru witũ wa watho nĩ ũbataraga mbeca nĩguo ũhote gũthiĩ na mbere gũkũra.

sentence2: Attending a performance at the IRT isn't just a fun walk in the park.
sentence2_translated: Gũceerera kĩrũgamĩrĩro kĩa IRT ti gwĩkenia tu.

sentence2: Attending a performance at the IRT will be a nice, easy break from hard work and thought.
sentence2_translated: Kũnyitanĩra na andũ arĩa marekĩra wĩra wĩra mũritũ na meciria-inĩ nĩ gũgakorũo kũrĩ ũndũ mũhũthũ kũhurũka.

sentence2: In order to fully enjoy a performance at the IRT, you need to pay very hard attention and study the performance and its history beforehand.
sentence2_translated: Nĩguo ũkenere mũno kĩrũgamĩrĩro kĩa IRT, nĩ wagĩrĩirũo kwĩruta wega na ũmenye kĩrũgamĩrĩro kĩu na maũndũ marĩa kĩarĩ kuo.

sentence2: Bill Gates donated $5 million to us.
sentence2_translated: Bill Gates nĩ atũheete mirioni ithano cia dollar.

sentence2: Given the state of the financial markets, our philanthropic partners have pulled back fro all their funding.

sentence2: We've been able to achieve a lot, due to the philanthropy we've received.

sentence2: Thank you for your $100 donation to the Indianapolis Museum of Art.

sentence2: Thanks but no thanks for lapsing on your donations in 1999.
sentence2_translated: Nĩ ngatho no ti ngatho nĩ ũndũ wa kũrega kũheana mĩhothi ĩyo mwaka-inĩ wa 1999.

sentence2: We are very glad you helped support the museum.
sentence2_translated: Nĩ tũkenagĩra mũno tondũ nĩ waateithĩrĩirie gũthondeka nyũmba ĩyo ya ũthamaki.

sentence2: I hope this issue gave you newfound enthusiasm.
sentence2_translated: Nĩ ngwĩhoka atĩ kĩgomano gĩkĩ nĩ kĩamũheire kĩyo.

sentence2: I know this issue causes you despair, but look forward to your vacation.
sentence2_translated: Nĩ njũĩ atĩ ũndũ ũcio nĩ ũragũrehagĩra kĩeha, no nĩ ũratangĩka mũno nĩ ũndũ wa thigũkũ yaku.

sentence2: I know you will do all in your power to fight breastfeeding cancer.

sentence2: This is the last donation drive we will have this season, so we need your help!

sentence2: We have two more fundraising drives this year.

sentence2: There was another theater that recently celebrated its 84th anniversary, but then it burned down.

sentence2: We're celebrating the grand opening of Indianapolis's newest theater.

sentence2: We're very happy that the Indianapolis Civic Theater has been operating for 85 years.

sentence2: Participants will be given prospects contact details and background information.
